DataElement.preferredName: Patient Attempt Remission Induction Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Count
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the count of how many attempts at remission induction the patient has received

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Attempt Remission Induction Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to attempts at remission induction for a patient

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Attempt Remission Induction Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: An activity intended to do or accomplish something.  Routinely used as in "number of tries to complete a procedure".:An abatement in intensity or degree (as in the manifestations of a disease).:The act of bringing about something.:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: An activity intended to do or accomplish something.  Routinely used as in "number of tries to complete a procedure".
An abatement in intensity or degree (as in the manifestations of a disease).
The act of bringing about something.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The quantity of the specified item.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: To determine the number or amount of something; the result of this activity.
